notes.player:
Example Macharian Hive Worlds

Persepolis, Voll

You hail from a hive world, a planet dominated by one or more titanic vertical cities known as ‘hives’. A hive is essentially hundreds of cities stacked one on top of the other, with the population of a single hive city often in the billions. No two hives are identical, but most are sealed environments where everything from the air citizens breathe, to their very bodies, are perpetually recycled — ‘hivers’ rarely leave the level they are born on, let alone the hive city itself. These massive populations are set to work in vast manufactora to fulfil the insatiable industrial labour needs of the Imperium. Life is strictly stratified, with the highborn living in the upper reaches with access to air and sunlight, and the middle levels devoted to perpetual toil. Those that will not accept a life of endless labour sink into the lawless bowels of the lower hive, where criminals and cults hold sway, and only the strong endure.

  • You gain +5 Agility and +5 to either Ballistic Skill, Perception, or Fellowship.

  • You gain a set of Ugly @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.OdTP4DEK3oGAjMWZ]{Filtration Plugs}.

These items are simple to manufacture and use. They come in pairs and are each set within the nostril to eliminate noxious pollutants and harmful gases (so long as the user remembers to not breathe through their mouth).

While using filtration plugs, you gain +2 SL on Fortitude Tests made to withstand the effects of harmful gases, such as in Zones with the @UUID[JournalEntry.hdElQAwiBr5AyoRf.JournalEntryPage.zQYkbNcsJmGintdL#hazard]{Hazard} Trait.

scriptData.label: Fortitude Tests to withstand harmful gases

patron.notes:
Your Patron is a member of the @UUID[JournalEntry.uJURMn2glWHhjqJk.JournalEntryPage.L6dhVRYQmfBKlwgO]{Astra Militarum}, commonly known as the Imperial Guard, the largest fighting force in the galaxy. It consists of innumerable infantry, fighting vehicles, and specialists spread across regiments drawn from nearly every world of the Imperium.

  • Influence: Your Patron has +2 Influence with the Astra Militarum.

  • Duty: Your Patron is either a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.ObkzgUGyoFE2R5x3]{Lord-Commissar} or a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.jdi2fWfiKW3nLblG]{Senior Officer}

character.notes:
@UUID[JournalEntry.uJURMn2glWHhjqJk.JournalEntryPage.L6dhVRYQmfBKlwgO]{Astra Militarum}

  • You gain +5 Toughness and +5 to either Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, or Strength.

  • You have 5 Advances to spend on Athletics, Discipline, Fortitude, Melee, Ranged, and Stealth.

  • You gain the @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.rWtFlGbvQIt894Ff]{Drilled} Talent.

  • You gain +1 Influence with the Astra Militarum.

  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.qQ8Y8nmiaTaKgzvs]{Knife}, a set of @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.pEFmeV070knXgwZ5]{Astra Militarum Flak Armour}, a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.0fB10YisRQoUabab]{Frag Grenade}, and 300 solars.

  • You gain your choice of any two of the following; a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.8tlu4X5Qpzl98Uye]{Lasgun}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.jNxvsLBybPPenmmn]{Laspistol}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.hWEzRGbvoBrhgKwJ]{Las Carbine}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.Dlv5TTOiyOJphsIl]{Entrenching Tool}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.fhXBHDbBiY6PUUTc]{Cameleoline Cloak}, or @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.tjUKnuDKTCCon28r]{Chainsword}.

notes.player:
You’ve been trained to face down the innumerable dangers of the universe, especially if you are backed up by other trained warriors. You have Advantage on Tests to resist the Frightened Condition, and you gain +1 SL to Discipline Tests for every ally with the Drilled Talent in the same Zone as you.

If another member of your group has the Drilled Talent, you can both choose to purchase the Drilled Talent again to gain the following:

  • Kill Team: When you are in the same Zone as another member of your party with the Drilled Talent, you can choose to act immediately after them in Initiative and gain +1 SL to all Tests.

effects.name: Kill Team
effects.description: Activate this effect when using the Kill Team option.

notes.player:
Perhaps the most basic tool in the @UUID[JournalEntry.GPqYZykonC12TJb1.JournalEntryPage.r6JYS3jOfrAEorvd]{Astra Militarum}, the standard model has a wide blade ideal for digging trenches, pits, and simply moving sand and dirt from one location to another. Most types are compact and can fold to a size that can be stowed away when marching or fighting.

An Entrenching Tool can also be used as an @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.lwPymw5Hah0H8Ey5]{Improvised (One-handed)} melee weapon. A properly sharpened Entrenching Tool counts as an @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.cnbaSByME7caQohv]{Axe} instead.

@UUID[JournalEntry.uJURMn2glWHhjqJk.JournalEntryPage.KznGxzLZLr1QaCoN]{Warrior}

Talents: Choose 2 Talents from @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.yaLYVLB3Mani31Bw]{Deadeye}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.Y6uxJU4DSkAhInLb]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.rWtFlGbvQIt894Ff]{Drilled}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.gA4E3advCZOPiOgR]{Duellist}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.Te254iTyJkwBk53f]{Tactical Movement}, and @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.vZk3RQwVjCjZAryj]{Two-handed Cleave}.

Skill Advances: You have 3 Advances to spend on Athletics, Fortitude, Medicae, Melee, Ranged, and Reflexes.

Specialisations: You have 2 Advances to spend on any Specialisations in Melee, Ranged, and Reflexes.

Equipment: You gain a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.qQ8Y8nmiaTaKgzvs]{Knife}, any Mundane Melee weapon or a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.tjUKnuDKTCCon28r]{Chainsword}, a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.jNxvsLBybPPenmmn]{Laspistol} or a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.vCeI41URKYV6iuAD]{Stub Revolver}, a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.8tlu4X5Qpzl98Uye]{Lasgun} or a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.QmZnSWRZOXFzyuWh]{Shotgun (Combat)}, a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.0fB10YisRQoUabab]{Frag Grenade}, @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.WCb8cnulcFJqgoxX]{Scrap-plate} or a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.hBLh8oe2wGUKmjV1]{Flak Jacket}, a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.B55qG1YQTS9IyuTm]{Backpack}, a set of @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.O5AtUszQGDbi8qmS]{Survival Gear}, and a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.Yp1Fmiml09wxHj4h]{Vox Bead}.

@UUID[JournalEntry.J8NVn5iNgM57cKmw.JournalEntryPage.NrJuy93Put0XCYq9#ranged-(bs)]{Ranged}

Extensive training in the use of longer firearms, such as lasguns, shotguns, bolters, autoguns, meltaguns, and similar ranged weapons.

@UUID[JournalEntry.J8NVn5iNgM57cKmw.JournalEntryPage.NrJuy93Put0XCYq9#ranged-(bs)]{Ranged}

Extensive training in the use of heavier ranged weaponry, such as lascannons, heavy bolters, missile launchers, and similarly devastating means of causing death and destruction.

You move in a calculated manner ensuring you can get into a safe position quickly. You can @UUID[JournalEntry.hdElQAwiBr5AyoRf.JournalEntryPage.xf46pBDy93sT0ZDl#take-cover]{Take Cover} as a @UUID[JournalEntry.hdElQAwiBr5AyoRf.JournalEntryPage.YEIzXenjBxa3GlTQ#free-actions]{Free Action}.

requirement.value: 1 Advance in both Athletics and Discipline

notes.player: When worn, a backpack or sling increases your maximum Encumbrance by 4.

This attachment uses a low-power laser to pick out a target so that the user can more easily make a kill shot. Others (including the target) may notice the appearance of the small red dot, though, revealing the shooter's presence.

A Laser Sight adds +1 SL to Ranged Attacks made with the weapon, but targets have Advantage on Awareness Tests to spot the wielder. An unaware target who notices the dot may attempt to Dodge the ranged attack. The sight may be switched on or off once per round as a Free Action.

system.usedWith: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.

notes.player:
This attachment uses a low-power laser to pick out a target so that the user can more easily make a kill shot. Others (including the target) may notice the appearance of the small red dot, though, revealing the shooter's presence.

A Laser Sight adds +1 SL to Ranged Attacks made with the weapon, but targets have Advantage on Awareness Tests to spot the wielder. An unaware target who notices the dot may attempt to Dodge the ranged attack. The sight may be switched on or off once per round as a Free Action.

system.usedWith: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.

notes.player: Countless hours of practice, training, and drilling have taught you to focus on firing your weapon, even when you are mere inches from danger. An enemy within Immediate range of you does not impose Disadvantage on your Ranged Attacks.

requirement.value: 2 Advances in both Discipline and Ranged

notes.player:
An Exterminator Cartridge is a stripped-down Flamer with enough fuel for a single use. They are popular among Imperial fanatics and zealots, who attach them to roaring Chainswords to douse their foes in cleansing fire as they charge in a blazing embodiment of the Emperor's fury.

An Exterminator Cartridge is a @UUID[Compendium.impmal-core.items.Item.blRx8XLXQaD9sjDz]{Flamer} that can be attached to any melee or ranged weapon. It can be fired as an Action, counting as a Ranged Attack. Once an Exterminator Cartridge has been fired, the Exterminator Cartridge is expended and takes 5 minutes to reload. Reloads can be acquired for 5 solars, and are Common.

system.usedWith: Any Melee or Ranged weapon with the Two-Handed Trait.

notes.player:
The classification of Blessed ammunition covers a broad range of hand-crafted and sanctified ammunition. Whether they are bolts and solid slugs engraved with wards of warp-banishment, or promethium purified and consecrated with holy oils, or crossbow bolts and stakes tipped with silver, inscribed with prayers and devotions, blessed ammunition is useful when hunting the most impure heretic or warp-spawned horror.

Blessed ammunition adds the wielder’s Willpower Bonus (WilB) to the Damage when attacking a daemon or creature with a Warp Threshold.

Perhaps the most widely used Imperial military-grade munitions, Frag munitions are most commonly found in grenade and missile form. Both explode in showers of shrapnel and other lacertaing metals, making them ideal for anti-infantry duties. Almost every warrior in the Imperium, from Militarum troopers to elite Space Marines, carries frag grenades to aid in assaulting positions, with grenade launchers providing longer range infantry suppression. Frag missiles are the more powerful version, with a greater range to soften up distant positions such as heavy weapon teams.

Frag grenades have a large radius, and deal decent damage.

This attachment uses a low-power laser to pick out a target so that the user can more easily make a kill shot. Others (including the target) may notice the appearance of the small red dot, though, revealing the shooter's presence.

A Laser Sight adds +1 SL to Ranged Attacks made with the weapon, but targets have Advantage on Awareness Tests to spot the wielder. An unaware target who notices the dot may attempt to Dodge the ranged attack. The sight may be switched on or off once per round as a Free Action.

system.usedWith: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.

notes.player:
An Omnispex uses spectral sensors to analyse wavelengths outside of Human perception, so that even in darkness few can hide themselves from detection.

A Omnispex can be attached to most ranged weapons and removes Disadvantage when firing into a Zone that is @UUID[JournalEntry.hdElQAwiBr5AyoRf.JournalEntryPage.zQYkbNcsJmGintdL#dark]{Dark} or @UUID[JournalEntry.hdElQAwiBr5AyoRf.JournalEntryPage.zQYkbNcsJmGintdL#poorly-lit]{Poorly Lit}.

system.usedWith: Any Ranged Weapon without the Blast, or Flamer Traits.

scriptData.label: Only succeeds on a roll of 01-05
Disadvantage on Tests affected by the absence of light
Heavy Cover
